Text: The most important in the release infos is the format ! You not say to know if this vid is an AVI, MP4, MKV, FLV or others ! Why not to mention it? It would be exxtremely usefull to kown it before to download a vid impossible to play on a home DVD's. Thank you to think about it !
Lol, up there beneath "Type", above "Size", There is something called "Files". In front of that is the number 2. Click that number and you'll see what format it is.
The torrent info tells you what file type it is. Just need to work a little harder for your free files.
As usual...thank you for sharing this and many others.
Thank you from Thailand Mister INGZ 86 ! I learned something important i could not guess, so thanks to have helped me so well ! I will put an orange flower to Buddha for you...
